attributes.action: introduce legislation amending section 11 of the offences against the person act to categorize as attempted murder any physical attack that targets the head of an individual who is immobile or otherwise unable to defend themselves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To many fights now end with the victim having their head stamped on or kicked. We believe the attacker(s) should be charged with Attempted Murder when this has been established as the method of attack. Any normal person knows how dangerous this is and it is time the sentencing reflected the repugnant nature of the action.
